javax.realtime
Class WaitFreeDequeue

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.realtime.WaitFreeDequeue
public class WaitFreeDequeue
extends java.lang.Object

The wait-free queue classes facilitate communication and synchronization between instances of RealtimeThread and java.lang.Thread . See WaitFreeWriteQueue or WaitFreeReadQueue for more details. Instances of this class create a WaitFreeWriteQueue and a WaitFreeReadQueue 90 and make calls on the respective read() and write() methods.

Constructor Summary
WaitFreeDequeue(java.lang.Thread writer, java.lang.Thread reader, int maxElements, MemoryArea memoryArea)
          A Queue with unsynchronized and non-blocking read and writ methods and synchronized and blocking read and write methods.

A Queue with unsynchronized and non-blocking read and writ methods and synchronized and blocking read and write methods.

maxElements - The maximum number of elements in the Queue
memoryArea - The MemoryArea in which this object and internal elements

Method Detail

blockingRead

public java.lang.Object blockingRead()
A synchronized call of the read() method of the underlying WaitFreeWriteQueue. This call blocks on queue empty and will wait until there is an element in the queue to return.
Returns:
the Object read from the queue.
Throws:
NoSuchElementsException -  

blockingWrite

public boolean blockingWrite(java.lang.Object object)
A synchronized call of the write()method of the underlying WaitFreeReadQueue. This call blocks on queue full and waits until there is space in this.
Parameters:
object - The java.lang.Object to place in this.
Returns:
true if the write object to the queue succeeded, false otherwise
Throws:
MemoryScopeException -  

force

public boolean force(java.lang.Object obj)
If this is full then this call overwrites the last object written to this with the given object. If this is not full this call is equivalent to the onBlockingWrite() call.
Parameters:
object - The java.lang.Object which will overwrite the last object if this is full. Otherwise object will be placed in this.

nonBlockingRead

public java.lang.Object nonBlockingRead()
An unsynchronized call of the read method of the underlying WaitFreeReadQueue
Returns:
the Object read from the WaitFreeReadQueue
Throws:
NoSuchElementException -  

nonBlockingWrite

public boolean nonBlockingWrite(java.lang.Object object)
An unsynchronized call of the write()method of the underlying WaitFreeWriteQueue. This call does not block on queue full.
Parameters:
object - The java.lang.Object to attempt to place in this.
Returns:
true if the object is now in this, otherwise returns false.
Throws:
MemoryScopeException -
